member.name: M:Wolontariat.AddEvent.Add_Event(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The method responsible for handling the subsystem of adding events. Retrieves information from the form entered by the user. Then it calls the InsertEvents method to send the downloaded values as method parameters. The event can also be created on the basis of the announcement, the method checks if the announcement number is sent using QueryString. If so, the value of the advertisement number is sent. If number -1 is not sent. In the InsertEvents method there is further support for the value of the advertisement number.

member.summary: Metoda obsługująca zgłaszanie wolontariusza do wykonania ogłoszenia potrzebującego. Wywołuję metodę AssignToAnnouncement, przesyła pobrane informacje z formularza wypełnionego przez użytkownika oraz numer wybranego ogłoszenia.

member.name: F:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.connection
member.summary: The class responsible for handling the connection to the database. It contains methods for adding, editing and deleting data from the database. It also includes methods for creating lists of objects on which it is easier to work.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.#ctor
member.summary: The method calls the Init method.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.Init
member.summary: The method includes a connection to the database.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.Connect
member.summary: The method that initiates the connection to the database.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.Disconnect
member.summary: The method terminating the connection to the database.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.ListUsers
member.summary: The method that creates a list of User type objects.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.ListInvitations
member.summary: The method that creates a list of objects like Invitation.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.ListAnnouncements
member.summary: The method that creates a list of objects like Advert.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.ListEvents
member.summary: The method that creates the list of objects types Event.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.InstertEvents(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method adds a new record to the database in the Events table.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.EditAnnouncement(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method edits the selected record in the Notification database in the Announcements table.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.EditEvent(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The method edits the selected record in the Events table in the database.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.InsertAnnouncement(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A method that adds a new record in the database in the Announcement table.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.SendInvitation(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A method whose task is to add further invitations to the Invitations table. Parameters that are downloaded from the user are the title and content. The parameters downloaded from the application are the user's id that sends the invitation, the id of the event that the user chooses, the id of the user to whom the invitation is to be sent, the logged-in user selects it. The last parameter is the date, the application itself downloads and transmits.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.InsertUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A method that adds new users to the Users table. The data entered is downloaded from the completed form by the user.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.AssignToAnnouncement(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A method that adds a new record to the Users Assigned Announcement table. The given table stores information about users and their applications to perform selected announcement.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.JoinToEvent(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method adds a new record to the Joined_Event table. The given table stores information about users and events in which they participate.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.DeclineFromAnnouncement(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method that deletes the selected record from the Users_Assigned_Announcemet table. This means giving up the selected advertisement.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.DeclineFromEvent(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method deletes the selected record from the Joined_Event table. It means abandoned events by a volunteer.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.DeleteAnnouncement(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method that deletes the selected record from the Announcements table. It means removing the advertisement.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.DeleteEvent(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method that deletes the record from the Events table. This means deleting the event.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.DeleteEvent_id_a(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method that deletes records from the Events table. This means deleting the event created on the basis of the announcement. The method removes all events that were based on the indicated advertisement.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.DeleteInvitation(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method that removes invitations to the selected event.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.Delete_Users_Assigned_Announcement(System.Int32)
member.summary: A method that deletes records that store information about users who have applied to perform the announcement. Removes all records with the selected number of the announcement.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.Delete_Users_Joined_Event(System.Int32)
member.summary: A method that deletes all records that store information about users who are participating in the event. Removes all records from the selected event number.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getMyActivities(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method that returns ads to which the logged-in user has applied.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getMyActivitiesEvents(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method returns events in which the logged-in user declared his presence.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getLogin(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A method that returns a record from the Users table based on email and password. Used to support logging.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getNickname_email(System.String)
member.summary: The method returns nickname based on an email from the Users table.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getNickname_id(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method returns nickname based on the user's id from the Users table.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getIdEvents(System.Int32)
member.summary: A method that returns a list of events that have been created based on the selected advertisement.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getIdAnnouncement(System.Int32)
member.summary: The method that returns id of the announcement from the database based on the number of the advertisement from the list of objects.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getId(System.String)
member.summary: The method that returns the id of the logged in user based on his email.

member.name: M:Wolontariat.SQLDatabase.getType_User(System.Int32)
member.summary: A method that returns a user type based on a user's id.

member.name: T:Wolontariat.Users
member.summary: The class responsible for the User type object. Attributes of this class are equivalent to the attributes of the Users table in the database. The data downloaded from the Users table is stored using the list of objects of the Users class. obiektów klasy Users.
